channel.title: How Can I Make The Bonus higher
channel.description:
Ok, So im not very good with coding i'm wondering when someone attacks somthing how can i make it so they get more xp for the attack i know this has been made but i havn't seen it out for along time so im wondering if anyone could re-tell me or somthing
If you could help me it would be much appreciated.
Thanks, Matt.[b][/b]

item.title: How Can I Make The Bonus higher
item.dc:creator: @mattbruce93 mattbruce93
item.description:
@mattbruce93 wrote:

[quote=“erko321, post:2, topic:217777”]search for hitdiff *
change the number after *
in client.java[/quote]

Thanks,
